reading.title: Daily Reading: Isaiah 40:28-31
reading.body: Do you not know? Have you not heard? The Lord is the everlasting God, the Creator of the ends of the earth. He will not grow tired or weary, and his understanding no one can fathom. He gives strength to the weary and increases the power of the weak. Even youths grow tired and weary, and young men stumble and fall; but those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.

devotion.title: Moment of Devotion
devotion.body: Take a moment to reflect on the everlasting nature of God in a world of constant change. Where have you felt weary this week? Offer that weariness to Him and trust in His promise to renew your strength. Let this truth anchor your soul today.

prayer.title: Prayer
prayer.body: O Lord, fount of all wisdom, grant me a discerning mind to seek truth, a humble heart to accept it, and a faithful spirit to live by it. May my studies of Your word and Your world draw me ever closer to You. Amen.
